text.p: These are the leading stories in the Sarajevo press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Mutual recognition between Bosnia and rump Yugoslavia was signed in Paris on Thursday. French president Jacques Chirac stresses that conflict is replaced now by the co-operation.
- Fate of the Open Broadcasting Network TV-IN will be discussed in Brusseles soon. Sixteen international donors, foreign governments and fondations participate in this project.
- Ankara to donate 10 Mercedes buses, 8,000 gas stoves and 4,000 gas regulators to Sarajevo.
- Commercial flights between Sarajevo and Zurich were established on Thursday.
- Office of the Croatian Chamber of Commerce opens in Sarajevo on Thursday.
